service.name: createSalesForecastCustom
service.description: Creates a Sales Forecast for the userLogin. Requires ORDERMGR_4C_CREATE permission. This will save the forecast into the history as well. Note that this service does not compute the forecast. That must be done in a higher level service.

service.name: updateSalesForecastCustom
service.description: Edit a Sales Forecast for the userLogin. Requires ORDERMGR_4C_UPDATE permission. This will save the forecast into the history as well. Note that this service does not compute the forecast. That must be done in a higher level service.
